hasAttributes.name: bankAccountId
hasAttributes.description: Unambiguous identification of the account to which credit and debit entries are made.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountName
hasAttributes.description: Name of the bank account, e.g. 'NatWest Checking Account'.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: The number allocated to the account by the individual's or company's own bank.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountSubType
hasAttributes.description: Specifies the sub type of account (product family group).

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountType
hasAttributes.description: Specifies the type of account (personal or business).

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitDescription
hasAttributes.description: Business unit (plain language) description to indicate the name or other identifying characteristics of the business unit.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitHierarchy1
hasAttributes.description: If a hierarchy exists in the business unit structure, use the field to capture the highest level of the hierarchy, e.g. global area with values such as North America, South America, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Far East, etc.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitHierarchy2
hasAttributes.description: If a hierarchy exists in the business unit structure, use the field to capture the next lower level of the hierarchy, e.g. regions with values such as East Coast, West Coast, Central-Western Europe, etc.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitHierarchy3
hasAttributes.description: If a hierarchy exists in the business unit structure, use the field to capture the next lower level of the hierarchy, e.g. cities with values such as Los Angeles, Boston, Frankfurt, etc.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitHierarchy4
hasAttributes.description: If a hierarchy exists in the business unit structure, use the field to capture the next lower level of the hierarchy.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitHierarchy5
hasAttributes.description: If a hierarchy exists in the business unit structure, use the field to capture the next lower level of the hierarchy.

hasAttributes.name: legalEntityIdentifier
hasAttributes.description: Third party registration number given by local authorities / local regulators, e.g. company registration number.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.
